backend/main.mo: Actor canister defining user profiles, daily entries, and CRUD operations with access control and date-sorted comparison utilities.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a progress comparison default-date feature to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summary map describing major frontend files and their functionality across UI, hooks, utilities, and views.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and OKLCH theme variables defining light/dark color tokens, borders, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting dark mode and mounting the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication state, profile setup gating, theme enforcement, and global toasts.
frontend/src/components/AboutView.tsx: Static informational view describing app features with cards and a back button.
frontend/src/components/AnalyticsView.ts: Analytics dashboard showing weight charts, rolling averages, and a 90‑day workout heatmap using backend data.
frontend/src/components/CalendarView.tsx: Renders the main calendar view, detects saved content per date, and opens day detail or photo comparison modals.
frontend/src/components/CameraCapture.ts: Manages camera activation, lens preference, zoom, error handling, and photo capture for entries.
frontend/src/components/compare/CompareD: Empty file or placeholder with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/compare/CompareS: Renders a comparison slot header showing a selected date, relative day offset badge, and a button to open a calendar.
frontend/src/components/DayDetailView.ts: Displays and edits a daily entry including photo, measurements, and workouts, with save and navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/MainLayout.tsx: Provides the main app layout with navigation between calendar, analytics, profile, and about views.
frontend/src/components/PhotoComparisonV: Allows selecting three dates to compare progress photos, showing images, date variance, and slot selection calendars.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Collects initial user profile data and units, then saves the profile via a backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileView.tsx: A profile settings form that displays and updates user info, units, and identity, using queries and mutations to save changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handling, and persists identity across reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend calls for user profiles, entries, and comparison data with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables plus UI tweaks for dark mode, calendar markers, and toast styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: React login page with branding, feature highlights, and a button triggering Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/utils/cameraErrorMapping.ts: Maps raw camera errors and DOMExceptions to normalized, user-friendly error types and messages.
Attempts to select a standard rear camera using heuristics and device info, with safeguards for Android Chrome PWAs.
frontend/src/utils/pwa.ts: Provides helpers to detect installed PWA mode and Android Chrome environments.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Time conversion and formatting utilities, including nanosecond mapping, day variance, and date offset helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters and session-based persisted parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark-mode classes, extended OKLCH-based color tokens, custom animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current schema and feature set, describing the app’s functionality, authentication, data model, and existing capabilities for tracking body transformation data.
